• If you have been feeling sick and tired, you will probably start to feel better around this 
time.
• Your pregnancy may just be beginning to show. This varies a lot from woman  
to woman.
12–16 weeks
• You may start to feel your baby move (see How your baby develops 
on page 23).
• Your tummy will begin to get bigger and you will need looser clothes.
• You may feel a surge of energy.
